testcase.name: Relationship Equivalence
testcase.description: Checks that relationship equivalence is correctly evaluated.

variation.name: Two calculation arcs are equivalent.
variation.description: 210.01 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority overrides a relationship, thus removing the calculation relationship. The instance would be invalid if the relationship had not been prohibited.

variation.name: Two calculation arcs are not equivalent (differing order).
variation.description: 210.02 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority has a different order to another arc and thus fails to prohibit the said arc. The instance is thus invalid since it doesn't add up.

variation.name: Two calculation arcs are equivalent (default order).
variation.description: 210.03 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority has no order attribute, and another arc has order one. The instance is thus valid since the arc is prohibited as the prohibiting arc's order takes the default value.
